text: @RandPaul Hmmm, asymptomatic and no known contact with a Covid-19 positive person...how the heck did you even qualified to be tested?  If you were concerned enough to get tested you should’ve just self quarantined for 14 days and not wasted a test. How dare you request elitist treatment.
